title: CSU/TL - for Wetlands & Riparian Areas
name: CSU/TL - for Wetlands & Riparian Areas
description: The boundary of the landunit scale defined by the San Juan National Forest to be used with the Current Landscape Condition (CLC) assessment.  It is the smallest geographical unit in a multi-scale hierarchical analysis framework of ecological units.   It is an equivalent alternative to the Landtype Association (LTA) landunit scale.

properties.EXCPDESC1: Exceptions may be granted only if an on-site impact analysis shows no degradation of the resource values.
properties.STIPDESC1: To protect perennial water impoundments and streams, and/or riparian/wetland vegetation by moving oil and gas exploration and development beyond the riparian vegetation zone.
